publications.title: AlphaPro at SemEval-2025 Task 8: A Code Generation Approach for Question-Answering over Tabular Data
publications.abstract: This work outlines the AlphaPro team's solution to SemEval-2025 Task 8: Question Answering on Tabular Data. The system utilizes a three-stage pipeline that exploits tabular structural information and code generation as intermediaries in answering questions to tables in natural language.

publications.title: Occlusion-Resilient Face Detection for Real-World Robustness Using Efficient Machine Learning Techniques
publications.journal: IJIMAI International Journal of Interactive Multimedia and Artificial Intelligence
publications.abstract: This study evaluates seven machine learning models aimed at improving occlusion-resilient face detection. This evaluation provides insights into the strengths and weaknesses of each model, offering guidance on selecting the best face detection approach based on real-world application needs.
